posts.post_title: ***SOLD*** FS: 1888 Scrapps (H.D. Smith and Company) – Edward “Ned” Hanlon ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
.
Prior sale fell through due to failure to receive payment
********************************************

Attractive raw card that displays well. Decent colors, with reverse stain lightly bleeding through to front of card.

There is a diagonal crease in corner of cap, vertical crease downward from left shoulder, and tip of mustache missing.

Price: ***SOLD*** $295 firm, postage paid. Shipped using USPS Priority Mail.


I would prefer payment via Paypal Family & Friends, but would accept check or money order (either which must clear before I ship).

First person to reserve and pay gets it.

My thanks.
Vincent
.
